synopsis.text:
Formula racing's youngest prodigy, Hayato Kazami, finds himself in the throes of the 11th Cyber Formula World Grand Prix, brimming with anticipation and intense competition. As the reigning champion, Hayato grapples with the weight of expectations and the mounting pressure to defend his title. To complicate matters, his once-trusted friend, Osamu Sugu, has reentered the fray as a formidable rival, vowing to claim the championship for himself.

In a world where cutting-edge technology determines the victor, Hayato's trusty Super Asurada SA-01 seems to be losing its edge. Fortunately, brilliant car designer Claire Fortan unveils the Super Asurada AKF-11, a next-generation racer engineered to conquer the championship. With this new machine and a dash of luck, can Hayato outmaneuver his opponents and secure a consecutive victory in the Cyber Formula World Grand Prix? The stage is set for a thrilling showdown between friends turned adversaries, as they race towards glory and the coveted title.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
